original_text: Think about what makes you beautiful. The way that you prepare your hair does not really make you beautiful. Gold things or beautiful clothes do not make you beautiful.
korean_text: 너희의 단장은 머리를 꾸미고 금을 차고 아름다운 옷을 입는 외모로 하지 말고

sentences.original_text: Think about what makes you beautiful.
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이 당신을 아름답게 하는지 생각해 보세요.

sentences.original_text: The way that you prepare your hair
does not really make you beautiful.
